sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../../context/AuthContext'; import { useBorrow } from '../../../context/BorrowContext'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const { borrowBook } = useBorrow(); const featuredBooks = [ { id: 1, title: "The Psychology of Money", author: "Morgan Housel", cover: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71TRUbzcvaL._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg", rating: 4.6, genre: "Finance", description: "Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness doing well with money isn't necessarily about what you know. It's about how you behave. And behavior is hard to teach, even to really smart people.", available: true }, { id: 2, title: "Atomic Habits", author: "James Clear", cover: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81bGKUa1e0L._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg", rating: 4.8, genre: "Self-Help", description: "No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving--every day. James Clear, one of the world's leading experts on habit formation, reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.", available: true }, { id: 3, title: "Deep Work", author: "Cal Newport", cover: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71QKQ9mwV7L._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg", rating: 4.5, genre: "Productivity", description: "Deep work is the ability to focus without distraction on a cognitively demanding task. It's a skill that allows you to quickly master complicated information and produce better results in less time.", available: true } ]; const newArrivals = [ { id: 4, title: "The Creative Act", author: "Rick Rubin", cover: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61zGOvBSgAL._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg", rating: 4.6, genre: "Self Help", description: "From the legendary music producer, a master at helping people connect with the wellsprings of their creativity, comes a beautifully crafted book many years in the making that offers that same deep wisdom to all of us.", available: true }, { id: 5, title: "பொன்னியின் செல்வன்", author: "கல்கி கிருஷ்ணமூர்த்தி", cover: "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSHd7H5dXOZgxAHBGzQcYQXiJX2JYdvBPJ1Ow&usqp=CAU", rating: 4.9, genre: "Historical Fiction", description: "A masterpiece of Tamil historical fiction that follows the story of Arulmozhivarman, who later became Raja Raja Chola I. Set in the 10th century, it weaves together political intrigue, romance, and adventure in the Chola empire.", available: true } ]; const bookOfDay = { title: "Lessons in Chemistry", author: "Bonnie Garmus", cover: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1634748496i/58065033.jpg", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", rating: 4.6, available: true }; const announcements = [ { id: 1, title: "Summer Reading Challenge", date: "2025-02-01", description: "Join our summer reading challenge and win exciting prizes! Read 10 books in 3 months to qualify.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1456513080510-7bf3a84b82f8?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" }, { id: 2, title: "Author Meet & Greet", date: "2025-02-15", description: "Meet bestselling author James Clear for a book signing and discussion session.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1475721027785-f74eccf877e2?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" }, { id: 3, title: "New Book Club", date: "2025-02-10", description: "Join our new Science Fiction book club! First meeting discusses 'Project Hail Mary'.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1532012197267-da84d127e765?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" } ]; const handleBorrow = (book) => { if (!isAuthenticated) { navigate('/login'); return; } borrowBook(book); navigate('/borrow-history'); }; const handleQuickView = (bookId) => { navigate(`/quick-view/${bookId}`); }; return (

Welcome to Our Library

Discover a world of knowledge with our extensive collection of books. From timeless classics to contemporary bestsellers, we have something for every reader.

Featured Books

{featuredBooks.map((book) => (

{book.title}

by {book.author}

★ {book.rating} {book.genre}

{book.description}

{book.available ? 'Available' : 'Not Available'}
))}

New Arrivals

{newArrivals.map((book) => (

{book.title}

by {book.author}

★ {book.rating} {book.genre}

{book.description}

{book.available ? 'Available' : 'Not Available'}
))}

Book of the Day

⭐ {bookOfDay.rating}

{bookOfDay.title}

by {bookOfDay.author}

{bookOfDay.description}

{bookOfDay.available ? 'Available' : 'Not Available'}

Library Updates

{announcements.map((announcement) => (

{announcement.title}

{announcement.date}

{announcement.description}

))}

Visit Us

📍 Main Branch

123 Library Street

Open: Mon-Sat, 9 AM - 8 PM

📞 Contact Us

Phone: (555) 123-4567

Email: library@example.com

); }; export default Home;
